title: BOJ Keeps Yen Watchers on Edge for Rate-Hike Clues
description: The upcoming Bank of Japan meeting offers scope for sharp movements in the yen as investors try to gauge the timing of its next hike — with a looming election adding to the confusion.
content: The upcoming Bank of Japan meeting offers scope for sharp movements in the yen as investors try to gauge the timing of its next hike — with a looming election adding to the confusion.
